name: dev-kit-prompt
description: Generate an advanced dev.kit prompt artifact for AI integration using dev.kit prompt.

sections.title: Purpose
lines: Produce a high-quality, repo-scoped prompt artifact by invoking `dev.kit prompt`.

sections.title: Logic
bullets: Validate inputs and require a non-empty `dev_prompt.request`.
If `dev_prompt.out` is not provided, generate a timestamped path under `{{DEV_KIT_STATE}}/codex/prompts/<repo-id>/`.
If `dev.kit prompt` fails, report the error and stop.
Return the output path and a one-line summary.

sections.title: Schema
bullets: Inputs: request (string, required), template (string, optional), out (path, optional), repo_id (string, optional)

sections.title: Output Rules
bullets: Return the output path and a one-line summary.
